name: Biography
body:
![](http://i.imgur.com/qYkb4dk.jpg)
### |[**Home**](https://brianwang9100.github.com)|   |[**Biography**](https://brianwang9100.github.com/Biography)|   |[**Project**](https://brianwang9100.github.com/Projects)|   |[**Resume**](https://brianwang9100.github.com/Resume)|   |[**Contact**](https://brianwang9100.github.com/Contact)|
### WHO IS BRIAN?
Brian is a programmer, innovator, and creator who studies Computer Science at the Georgia Institute of Technology. His permanent residence is at Union City, California in the Bay Area. He spends his free time tutoring others and working on his personal iOS projects. He also loves to make a-cappella remixes, origami creations to give to his friends, and organize large scale camping trips.

Some notable awards:
 - Eagle Scout
 - Honorable mention from Apple for top iOS app at MHacks 2014

### SKILLS
Objective-C, SpriteBuilder, Cocos2D, Swift, Java
 
Other Skills: Leadership, Public Speaking, Product Marketing, UI design

### INVOLVEMENT
Startup Exchange (GATech)
Web Development Club (GATech)
Lead Project Organizer (Union City Government)
 - 30 Fruit Trees and irrigation system at 7 Hills Garden
 - 30 Spruce Trees garbage cleanup at Contempo Park

### INTERESTS
Mobile Development, Web Development, Video Game Development, Server Architecture, Artificial Intelligence

Other Interests: Origami, Dancing, Singing, Video Games, Camping, Skeet Shooting, Badminton, Community Service Projects, Teaching, Making funny faces, etc.

### MISSION STATEMENT
To learn as much as I can about programming and develop my skill-set through internships and experience.
 - Freshman: Internship at Fortune 500 company freshman program
 - Sophomore: Internship at rising start-up
 - Junior: Internship at Fortune 500 company
 - Senior: Internship at start-up
 - Graduation: High-level Job
